TableField.name: VehicleID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track vehicles of all types

TableField.name: AssignedOrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Assigned Organization|The name of the local organization assigned to, and responsible for, this vehicle

ForeignField.name: AssignedOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Assigned Organization|The name of the local organization assigned to, and responsible for, this vehicle

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this vehicle

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this vehicle

RemoteField.name: LocationID
RemoteField.phrase: Location|Specific location within the facility where the vehicle is located during business hours

ForeignField.name: Location
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific location within the facility where the vehicle is located during business hours

TableField.name: VehYear
TableField.phrase: Year|The year the vehicle was manufactured

TableField.name: VehicleModelID
TableField.phrase: Vehicle Model|A combined field used to associate this vehicle model with another record

ForeignField.name: VehicleModel
ForeignField.phrase: Vehicle Model|A combined field used to associate this vehicle model with another record

TableField.name: VehicleTypeID
TableField.phrase: Vehicle Type|A combined field used to describe this vehicle type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: VehicleType
ForeignField.phrase: Vehicle Type|A combined field used to describe this vehicle type when associating it with other records
ForeignField.sample: Direct Store Delivery Refrigeration Vehicle; Active Agenda, HQ

TableField.name: VehBody
TableField.phrase: Vehicle Body|A brief description of this vehicle body for identification purposes
TableField.sample: This vehicle has been custom painted with the company logo and color scheme.

TableField.name: VehOperationTypeID
TableField.phrase: Operation Type|The type of operation performed for the organization by the vehicle

CodeField.name: VehOperationType
CodeField.phrase: Operation Type|The type of operation performed for the organization by the vehicle

TableField.name: VehColorID
TableField.phrase: Color|The color of the vehicle

TableField.name: VehFuelTypeID
TableField.phrase: Fuel Type|The type of fuel required for operation of the vehicle

CodeField.name: VehFuelType
CodeField.phrase: Fuel Type|The type of fuel required for operation of the vehicle

TableField.name: VehDesc
TableField.phrase: Vehicle Decsription|A brief description of the vehicle and any special factors needing to be tracked
TableField.sample: This is Doe's company vehicle. Doe uses the vehicle for business and personal use.

TableField.name: VehValue
TableField.phrase: Vehicle Value|The present estimated value of the vehicle stated in the currency established for this site installation of the software

TableField.name: VehLoad
TableField.phrase: Load Capacity|The maximum weight the vehicle is capable of carrying

TableField.name: VehLoadUnitsID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: VehLoadUnitCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: VehLoadUnitCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: VehLoadUnits
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: VehWeight
TableField.phrase: Unladen Weight|The weight of the vehicle without any load

TableField.name: VehWeightUnitsID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: VehWeightUnitCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: VehWeightUnitCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: VehWeightUnits
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: OwnerID
TableField.phrase: Owner|The name of the organization the vehicle is registered to

ForeignField.name: Owner
ForeignField.phrase: Owner|The name of the organization the vehicle is registered to

TableField.name: VehNo
TableField.phrase: Vehicle Number|The number assigned to the vehicle for asset tracking purposes

TableField.name: VehIDNo
TableField.phrase: Identification Number|The number assigned to the vehicle by the vehicle manufacturer. This number is often used by the government and vehicle dealerships to identify and track vehicle history

TableField.name: VehLicenseNo
TableField.phrase: License Plate Number|The number assigned by the government agency responsible for maintaining vehicle operation safety and environmental performance standards

TableField.name: StateID
TableField.phrase: State of Registration|The name of the state or similar geographic zone where the vehicle is registered

ForeignField.name: CountryID
ForeignField.phrase: Country|The internationally recognized name of the country

ForeignField.name: Country
ForeignField.phrase: Country|A combined field used to associate this country with another record

ForeignField.name: State
ForeignField.phrase: State of Registration|A combined field used to associate this state with another record

RemoteField.name: RegExpires
RemoteField.phrase: Registration Expires|Date the vehicle's registration expires. The vehicle's registration must be renewed prior to this date

TableField.name: Commercial
TableField.phrase: Commercial Vehicle?|whether or not the vehicle is a commercial motor vehicle. This classification is usually associated with an unladen weight; such as, 26,000 pounds

SummaryField.name: IncurredCost
SummaryField.phrase: Incurred Cost|The sum of incurred costs for this record

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the vehicle

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the vehicle

CombinedField.name: VehLoadCapacity
CombinedField.phrase: Load Capacity|The maximum load capacity of the vehicle as established by the vehicle manufacturer

CombinedField.name: VehTotalWeight
CombinedField.phrase: Vehicle Weight|The total unladen weight of the vehicle as established by the vehicle manufacturer or subsequent, more accurate, weight evaluations

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Vehicle
CombinedField.phrase: Vehicle|A combined field used to describe this vehicle when associating it with other records

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about a vehicle

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about a vehicle

EditScreen.phrase: Numbers|Associate tracking numbers with a vehicle

EditScreen.phrase: License|Edit license and registration information for a vehicle

EditScreen.name: Assignments
EditScreen.phrase: Assignments|Assign vehicle operators to the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Odometer
EditScreen.phrase: Odometer|Associate odometer readings with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Equipment
EditScreen.phrase: Equipment|Associate equipment with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: AssetProtection
EditScreen.phrase: Audits|Associate audit requirements with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: CostExposures
EditScreen.phrase: Exposures|Associate cost exposures with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Opportunities
EditScreen.phrase: Opportunities|Associate financial opportunities with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Hazards
EditScreen.phrase: Hazards|Associate hazards with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Regulations
EditScreen.phrase: Regulations|Associate regulations with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Standards
EditScreen.phrase: Standards|Associate standards with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: BusinessContinuation
EditScreen.phrase: Continuity|Associate business continuation requirements with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Permits
EditScreen.phrase: Permits|Associate operating permits with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Insurance
EditScreen.phrase: Insurance|Associate insurance policies with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Agreements
EditScreen.phrase: Agreements|Associate business agreements and/or contracts with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities for the vehicle

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: FileRetention
EditScreen.phrase: Files|Associate physical files and retention methods with the vehicle

EditScreen.name: BestPractices
EditScreen.phrase: Best Practices|Associate best practices with the vehicle

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
